          <title>
            <string language="de">Was andere glauben - wie andere leben</string>
            <string language="en">What others believe - how others live</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce que d'autres croient - comment d'autres vivent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O que outros acreditam - como outros vivem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa altri credono - come altri vivono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι άλλοι θεωρούν - πώς άλλοι ζουν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué otros creen - cómo viven otros</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Ein kleiner Vergleich der fünf Weltrelgionen. Verschiedene Aussagen und Symbole zum Zuordnen.</string>
            <string language="en">A brief comparison of five world relgions. Different statements and symbols for correct matching.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une brève comparaison de cinq relgions du monde.

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma comparação breve de cinco relgions do mundo.
Indicações e símbolos diferentes para combinar correto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un breve confronto di cinque relgions del mondo. 
Istruzione e simboli differenti per la corrispondenza corretta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συνοπτική σύγκριση πέντε παγκόσμιων relgions. 
Διαφορετικές δηλώσεις και σύμβολα για το σωστό ταίριασμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una comparación abreviada de cinco relgions del 
mundo. Diversos declaraciones y símbolos para corresponder con 
correcto.</string>
